summary:
The company I work for has insisted on a mandatory return to office following nearly four years of, at least partial, work from home.  We're not in full time but three days a week. 
I firmly believe the benefits of working from home far outweigh the negatives for the great majority of employees and return to work mandates are ill advised...
title: The plus side to mandatory return to office
